thread.section_title: OptiContacts.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OptiContacts.com | opticontacts.com | 11 of 517
thread.title: Travis Mcilree

author: Travis Mcilree
title: Travis Mcilree
text: I placed an order for contacts. I was sized at an 8.4 diameter and the contacts I ordered were only available in 8.5 (.1 doesn't matter). Two other online vendors had shipped the same order without issue. Their people obviously know contacts better. Opticontacts delayed the order by several days while verifying with the optometrist. I'm happy with them, but it could have been easier.
